page.title: 13PARTRIDGE GREEN HEALTH
page.content: The village has a medical SURGERY held in an end-of-terrace house near the fire station in the HIGH STREET on MONDAYS,TUESDAYS,WEDNESDAYS and FRIDAYS from 8.30am.until 10.00am. DR.PARKES has been the village DOCTOR for the past 16 years.He has a keen sense of humour and is popular with his patients.His partner is DR.ALLEN from nearby Cowfold.If the SURGERY is closed a recorded telephone message gives information on EMERGENCIES. In this event Crawley,Chichester,Brighton and Midhurst HOSPITALS are used.When accidents happen at school DR.PARKES is called upon.Because of the many families with young children in the village the DOCTOR is involved with the usual childhood ailments and illnesses.
